title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 362.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 362.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of the regulations set forth in this Part, these terms are defined as follows: (a) The term SEQR means the New York State

Environmental Quality Review Act. (b) The term ENCON means the New York State

Department of Environmental Conservation. (c) The term EIS means an environmental
impact statement required by SEQR (as implemented by the rules and regulations
of ENCON). Notes

362.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
